quotes.quote: The crime of loving is forgetting.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman
quotes.quotes: I'd rather have roses on my table than diamonds on my neck.

quotes.quote: Nature uses human imagination to lift her work of creation to even higher levels.
quotes.author: Michael Pollan
quotes.quotes: A lawn is nature under totalitarian rule.

quotes.quote: The most I can do for my friend is simply be his friend.
quotes.author: Warren E. Burger
quotes.quotes: Free speech carries with it some freedom to listen.

quotes.quote: Honor is not the exclusive property of any political party.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln
quotes.quotes: All that I am, or hope to be, I owe to my angel mother.

quotes.quote: I never called my work an 'art'. It's part of show business, the business of building entertainment.
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock
quotes.quotes: Every good painter paints what he is.
